Posts.Content: Jul 18, 2012 01:30AM Sharon_R wrote: I am sorry to hear of your diagnosis. Have you already has surgery? I have an MRI guided biopsy tomorrow and feel like I have DCIS. Mammo showed microcalcs, stereotactic biopsy showed ADH. Excision biopsy scheduled then postponed due to results of pre surgery MRI. Birads 4 at original 12:00 spot and now a new spot of curve type 2 enhancement at 3:00 suspicious for malignancy. And left Breast is Birads 3 which also worries me. So scared. Learned of ADH two days after my father passed away of cancer. So biopsy tomorrow will determine if I will still have excision biopsy or something more extensive. I have been having shooting pain in both breast for the past three days off and on.
Posts.Title: Biopsy Tomorrow - Strong Family History - Scared howhm02l Beckers
